--- create_uniq_null_filtered_index.sql
create unique null_filtered index foo_bar on foo (foo)

--- AST
&ast.CreateIndex{
  Create:       0,
  Rparen:       53,
  Unique:       true,
  NullFiltered: true,
  IfNotExists:  false,
  Name:         &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 34,
        NameEnd: 41,
        Name:    "foo_bar",
      },
    },
  },
  TableName: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 45,
        NameEnd: 48,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Keys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 50,
        NameEnd: 53,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
      Dir: "",
    },
  },
  Storing:      (*ast.Storing)(nil),
  InterleaveIn: (*ast.InterleaveIn)(nil),
}

--- SQL
CREATE UNIQUE NULL_FILTERED INDEX foo_bar ON foo(foo)
